amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to ensure no funds are used to support an increase in the weight of the Chinese renminbi in the Special Drawing Rights basket of the International Monetary Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
